channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: During a strip search officers discover that a male inmate has a fetish for women's lingerie; a young couple charged with trying to steal a puppy get caught in a compromising situation in a restroom; a pregnant woman is accused of prostitution.

channel.title: Jail

channel.title: Jail

channel.desc: A detective intervenes in a chaotic fight; suspects are arrested for dealing cocaine out of their grandmother's house; a disturbed father claims he accidentally fired off five rounds inside his house; a couple argues.
